title: League of Nostalgia
body:
What's the most nostalgic that gets you every time in league?

For me it would be the old map and splash arts

replies.body: when i get a pentakill... because ive never got one on this account feelsbadman
What's a Pentakill? Oh wait that's where you die 5 times in a row yeah? I've done that a few times xD

Old items like Force of Nature

Also I was playing Karma the other day and remembering her old kit, I actually really liked it. It would be awesome to have the opportunity to play around with an old version of league for a bit, just to remember those old times ^_^
FON,leviathan and atma's impaler.... those were the days.

I'm nostalgic every time someone fondly reminisces how they started playing around when [insert one of the previous 90 champs here] came out and I faintly remember that Udyr and Poppy were featured in the store. 

Far out, that was a long time ago.

Everything as it was in season 2.
Like bloodrazors on kog for that super early baron, force of nature, 8k hp tanks, etc.

I have some friends who have been around since the inception of league, all reminiscence from time to time about 'the old league'. I intended to play at season 2, by time I got around to it, it was mid season 5 lol
So I'm not really missing much I guess if I never had it

if you want a nostalgia hit every game, turn on the classic summoners rift music in sound.

also when i see old icons is what gets me
